deal.scope_of_work_and_pricing: HTML button linking to the scope creation portal (WF-01 Action 3).

contact.sof_consultant_id: Consultant unique ID carried through approval.
contact.sof_project_id: Project object ID tied to the scope.
contact.sof_sales_deal_id: Sales deal ID for note association.
contact.sof_record_ids_array: List of consultant record IDs impacted by approval.
contact.sof_consultant_hourly_prices: Hourly rates submitted in scope request.
contact.sof_consultant_daily_prices: Daily rates submitted in scope request.
contact.sof_hj_hourly_prices: Internal H&J hourly rates for comparison.
contact.sof_hj_daily_prices: Internal H&J daily rates for comparison.
contact.sof_marketing_email_view_response_button: Generated link displayed on approver contact record.

hj_consultants.scope_of_work_approval_comment: Approver comment persisted on the consultant record.
